mapper.select: select employee_info.id_num as "idNum", employee.realname as "employeeName", p_info.handle_state as "handleState", p_info.id, p_info.employee_id as 'employeeId' from sys_user as employee, nl_employee_info as employee_info, nl_employee_physiology_info as p_info where employee_info.employee_id = employee.id and p_info.employee_id = employee.id
